com.elsevier.xml

Class XSLTProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elsevier.xml.XSLTProcessor

  • public class XSLTProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provides xml transforming capabilities (via xslt) for an object passed as a String.
    Author:
    Darin McBeath

        Transform the content using the specified stylesheet.
        Parameters:
        stylesheetName - name of the stylesheet (that was set in init)
        content - the xml to be transformed
